actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the Washington National Opera, and for other purposes.
short_title: Washington National Opera Commemorative Coin Act of 2004

summary.text: Washington National Opera Commemorative Coin Act of 2004 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint, until December 31, 2010, coins in commemoration of the Washington National Opera. Provides for the issuance and sale of such coins.

titles.title: Washington National Opera Commemorative Coin Act of 2004
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the Washington National Opera, and for other purposes.
